name: that one time you left everything that you needed at home
name_original: that one time you left everything that you needed at home
description:
This game was made as part of the Queerness and Games workshop 2014 and was exhibited at Queerness and games conference at UC Berkeley, thanks to the wonderful world-wide web, it is now available online!
 
I'm still trying to figure out how to get this online with the music working (for free X_X) for now, if you download the folder and click the "index.html" file it will run in your browser!
